item.title: In a dilemma
item.description: This is a record, a message from me to one of my ex-firned. The talked was, 2020-05-06 While you are in a dilemma, we humans are totally normal to be afraid of it. This may be a process; afraid makes us strong and a much more experienced people. Humans suppose to grow like that! So let it be! Once you are afraid of something, don’t give up on trying it; think about the issue, think as hard as you can, and try to resolve it!
